creator: Whitethorn Games
descriptionHtml: Evan's Remains is a mystery-thriller puzzle adventure about finding a missing boy: Evan. The game combines logic-based platform puzzles with narrative inspired by Japanese graphic adventure games.
descriptionShort: A mystery-thriller puzzle adventure about finding a genius boy.
